Name: Mecha Blade
About the game: As Edgar Grey, chosen by the Angel Uriel to operate the Behemoth Mecha Suit to save the nuclear devastated world from the evil lord Zebul. Command you and your army to change the course of the world. What will you make of this new world in this intense Mecha SRPG? This SRPG has 43 unique maps with three different endings. Each ending takes 5-7 hours to complete. The enemy is everywhere and you only have you, your suit, and your allies. You must choose your choices carefully as what you do will impact how others feel about Edgar and who joins your party or not. There are many secrets to find, can you find them all?
